website_summaries.verdict: A dependable portable air conditioner that can cool mid-size rooms at an attractive price point.
pros: Can cool areas up to 550 sq
Has dehumidifier and fan-only functions for increased versatility
Auto-evaporation system allows for continuous operation without having to drain water
cons: Some users find it to be noisier than expected

customer_reviews.title: Worthless waste of money stops working almost immediately
customer_reviews.text: After just a few weeks the ac started only working at half capacity-literally, air only comes out the right side of the vents. Called Amazon for help and they said they would contact the manufacturer and get back to me, and never did. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Eastonia

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I set it up today and it works. It draws 9.5A and is on a 15 amp circuit with just 150 watts of other stuff. I had to order a patio door vent kit from Sylvane for $80 because our window is 59 inches tall. It is a little bigger than I expected (see photo). Our living/dining room is 400 sq. ft., well within the specification of 400-550 sq. ft. It keeps the room at 75 when it is 88 outside, but when it is 94 the room creeps up to 80. It is fairly quiet, much quieter than a window air conditioner we used to have.
customer_reviews.author: JeffreyKopp

customer_reviews.title: Great AC for the household.
customer_reviews.text: Awsome sauce!!!!! Great ac for a master bedroom!! Almost to cold, I run it to get the heat out of the room for a few mins then shut it off for a few hours till it warms back up or as needed . Florida heat🙃
customer_reviews.author: john james dixon

customer_reviews.title: It is WAY TOO LOUD!
customer_reviews.text: I dislike this product so much that I am going to have to return it. It is WAY TOO LOUD! The parts are flimsy and made out of very cheap plastic (if that). They do not fit well with the other parts and when you stretch it a little to try to make it fit, it all falls apart. I actually saw exact same air conditioner at Home Depot for less money. Hum. The things we do to buy a name brand and think it's going to be a better make, model or unit. Nope! Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Feeny

customer_reviews.title: Barely can keep cool a 250+ sq. ft. room
customer_reviews.text: The air conditioner performs below expectations. It can barely keep cool a 250+ sq. ft. room even in a mid 80F's day. The unit tends to build condensation on top, and pumps way too much humid air into the house. Actually there has been no water in the tank even after extremely humid days (by Northeast standards). The dehumidifier does not much than blowing air. Unless you live in semi desert area and are planning to cool a very small room, do not buy this unit.
customer_reviews.author: EJH

customer_reviews.title: I will review again when temp is in 80s.
customer_reviews.text: To early to see how this works when temp is higher 80s in Seattle but for low 70’s it’s been fine and plug into the port in the 557 sq ft apt! Hopefully, I can update when the temps are warmer but it seems like a fine product. Packaging was great and a very timely delivery by Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Edgy

customer_reviews.title: died in 11months
customer_reviews.text: i used this ac to cool off a room with lots of electronics running in it, so the device is in use year round. it lasted 11 months exactly from purchase date before the motor went out. i greatly regret not buying the extended warranty on it
customer_reviews.author: bryan bennett

customer_reviews.title: It would definitely do a better job cooling if it had a separate hot side ...
customer_reviews.text: Underpowered. And where is the more efficient and efficacious two-hose model? It would definitely do a better job cooling if it had a separate hot side intake tube, instead of exhausting the already-cooled air from the room out the window.
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: kicks out cold air - will cool a small size studio very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: candace scott

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: This thing wouldn't cool a room in the middle of winter. It's 93 degrees outside and 87 inside.
customer_reviews.author: pjscott

customer_reviews.title: Help
customer_reviews.text: My remote isn't working, is this something that is under warranty or can I buy a new one? I can't figure out how to turn it on without the remote.
customer_reviews.author: starfish

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is loud and rattles randomly. It also doesn't reach the sq footage it says it does.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of 2 units ordered is defective, now what to do?
customer_reviews.text: One unit of the 2 ordered works perfectly, the other unit is defective, the AC does not work. the unit runs with no cooling. the none working unit must be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: john a cogan

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great unit. Easy to set up and works well. Not too loud either!
customer_reviews.author: RL

customer_reviews.title: This is a winner!
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth air conditioner in two years as the three previous broke down after a matter of weeks. I do NOT live in a hot area but summer nights are too warm for me and my thyroid issues. The others were all Delonghi. This is my first Honeywell. It's was easily twice as quiet as the previous units and I haven't had a problem all summer long. It runs all night every night. Not loud. Soft touch controls which are really great and it does a great job. I will never buy the other brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie S.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible AC
customer_reviews.text: Save your money it doesn’t work well at all. Pretty much what everyone else said.
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: As described, noisier than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Works fine noisier than expected. Received item in a damaged carton some parts fell out of the box when i picked it up at the post office. The ground inlet was broken off the plug.
customer_reviews.author: Alpina Corp

customer_reviews.title: Good unit
customer_reviews.text: All portable units are loud, but this one is less loud than the others I have had. It is a nice design and you can direct the vent.
customer_reviews.author: robin janis

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.
customer_reviews.text: Used it for weeks this summer. So far so good. Quieter than the last R2D2 (which is what these portable AC units remind me off). Really surprised that their was not a build up of water. When I tried to drain before storage, there was nothing there to drain. Hoping for many great seasons.
customer_reviews.author: A.T.

customer_reviews.title: Awful Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: It really pushes out the cold air and it isn't as loud as others have described. Their customer service is beyond awful so far. I need an extension for the window bracket to use it where I need it, so I've now called three times, left two voicemails to call me and did a chat session only to be referred back to the number I've already called multiple times. Without the bracket extension I can't use the unit where I need it the most. I shouldn't have to go to Home Depot to build something.
customer_reviews.author: Methman

customer_reviews.title: this unit works wonderfully and I have a large bedroom and it has ...
customer_reviews.text: Other than the ducting tube out the window, this unit works wonderfully and I have a large bedroom and it has cooled it sufficiently. I haven't gotten my electric bill yet so not sure about the drain there but in so far as the unit cooling the room I am extremely happy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Set up
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and get it running right away. No AC in the NW so even if it just cools one room it is helpful.
customer_reviews.author: John Eason

customer_reviews.title: Ice cold
customer_reviews.text: A bit loud, but when I'm 70° instead of 110° it doesn't matter. Works well with the type of window it was designed for, the hose is too short for my application, but that's because my window is higher up. I'd suggest the fuzzy insulating tape, to seal it up, lot of leakage from where the plastic brads are on the window rail.
customer_reviews.author: Wkp_Taco

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure it's great! However
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure it's great! However, i wasn't able to purchase due to a recent move and change of address mixup, so sorry!
customer_reviews.author: Ann Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love our air conditioner!!! It far exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Ray

customer_reviews.title: Way underperformed. I have about 800 square feet and ...
customer_reviews.text: Way underperformed. I have about 800 square feet and installed 2 of these units. It was hotter in the office than outside. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: John R

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL MACHINES, bought two.
customer_reviews.text: This MN Series 12,000 BTU Portable Air Conditioner (by Honeywell) is a wonderful machine. I bought two of them one year apart. We use gabled lofts as bedrooms. They used to be too hot. Now they are wonderful, sometimes even cold (even on the hottest days). I was puzzled after reading the few negative reviews, but careful reading convinces me that most of the problems people have had stem not from the machine but from: 1) haste (impatience), frustration and anger 2) improper installation 3) selecting the wrong unit (not matching the size of the room with the Btu's of the machine) 4) and failure to consider humidity in the analysis. Humidity must be included in choosing the right machine.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Arctic cold air blast
customer_reviews.text: If you like cold air this is the air conditioner for you! I am so happy with this unit! My bedroom gets the hot afternoon sun and feels like a sauna. I bought a smaller/cheaper portable air conditioner thinking it would be sufficient but the smaller unit barely got cool air to the bed area. I bought this unit which covers more square footage. The minute I plugged it in the cold air came flowing out. The bedroom was cool in minutes, cold in maybe 15 minutes, and maintained that temperature automatically. The sleep function is great! So happy with this unit!!! Don’t go with a small cheap unit - you’ll be sorry. It’s worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: recommend buying extended warranty
customer_reviews.text: Didn't have a chance to write a review until now. Item was used for the bedroom and had to buy extra attachments for the sliding door. I have to say it worked great for the first 2 years and I had used the item about 2-3 times a week, about 4 -6 hours a day during the summer months in California. This year it just stopped producing cold air and luckily I had bought the extended warranty from square trade. After contacting Jmateck (Honeywell contact) via email they were able to replace my item within a week. NO CHARGE.
customer_reviews.author: Josephine E. Baltazar

customer_reviews.title: Takes the edge off the heat
customer_reviews.text: I have my A/C in a 96 square foot room, vented out the window and set at 61 degrees, it runs for about 20-30 minutes and turns off saying its 48 degrees in the room but multiple thermometers say its 80 degrees in the room. Mind you my room is insulated all the way around, blinds and blackout curtains on each window. Its been a month and a half, never has it got the temperature in the room below 78 degrees. pass on this POS. looking into how to return the damn thing
customer_reviews.author: James Socal

customer_reviews.title: Great Value & Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very very impressed with this portable AC unit. Super well made, easy to use and easy to move which is crucial. It has nice wheels on the bottom, the cord is long and sturdy, the controls are simple to use and it is very effective at cooling the garage we have it in. I highly recommend this. We looked up ratings on consumer reports and couldnt be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Dougley McCallister

customer_reviews.title: Effective but noisy.
customer_reviews.text: Effective at cooling the room (I'll estimate 200-300sq ft) quickly. Wish it had a timer I could set in the morning before work- only an expiration timer. Now that it's winter I wish I had also considered a heating unit in one. Somewhat difficult to sleep past the noise, though I can't truly say how other units compare- they all attest to similar decibel output. Still glad I have it.
customer_reviews.author: Modena

customer_reviews.title: Control panel and remote stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Control panel and remote stopped working. Purchased the unit late July and this past week the control panel and remote stopped working. Unit did cool my place nicely, exhaust unit fits nicely in the sliding window, noise level was like a tower fan.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Good unit, but it did come cracked
customer_reviews.text: Issue: The unit came cracked, there nothing protecting the center of the unit just the top and bottom. It's mainly superficial. Keep your box and packing matieral until you inspect it and plug it in. Keeps our bedroom nice and cool, it is kind of loud but I like white noise so it works for us.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Why did I wait to get this Honeywell? It’s GREAT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery .... easy set up. Easier than lifting the old box air conditioners into a window. Perfect for den. One negative. The cat hates it. Lol. I’m sure he’ll get use to it.
customer_reviews.author: mcedster631

customer_reviews.title: Recieved, didn't work.
customer_reviews.text: Positive is I had no problem retuning it. The seller stood behind the product. I have one just like it and works great. Not sure what happened to this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to move from living room to bedroom
customer_reviews.text: This air conditioner has saved the day for us in our second floor apartment. Easy to move from living room to bedroom. Cools the whole room quickly, and has temp and time controls to make your schedule work with your cooling requirements. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Steven B. Burke

customer_reviews.title: Do the job very well
customer_reviews.text: Ac for a living room Good looking unit Easy to use
customer_reviews.author: mousy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great air conditioner. Made our HOT summer days much more bearable !
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little air conditioner. It does what we expected it to do.
customer_reviews.author: texan38

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: We initially planned to purchase ductless a/cs for our home until we realized how difficult it is to install them in NYC due to the need to have access to an outside area to place the compressors. Buying portable air conditioners was our Plan B. We selected this product based on product description and reviews . We purchased two to start---one for the living room and one for the master bedroom. They actually work! We are extremely happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Chary

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase! Very Easy to Install Vent Too!
customer_reviews.text: Glad to have purchased this machine! The home I rent has no central air conditioning, and the master bedroom (mine) faces the southwest. All the day's heat is accumulated on this side of the house, so keeping the machine running through the afternoon and early evening hours has helped the comfort level immensely!! The plus is that it has a timer, off or on, making it easier to beat the higher energy cost in summer. The only downside is the noise: not the quietest when positioned in a smaller room.
customer_reviews.author: Denny F

customer_reviews.title: ... this air conditioner for a few weeks now and love it. It cools a very large room very ...
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this air conditioner for a few weeks now and love it. It cools a very large room very quickly and I like that we don't have to drain the water out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Jody Vice-Eggleston

customer_reviews.title: Actually never got to see it. It got as ...
customer_reviews.text: Actually never got to see it. It got as far as my driveway, then was returned with no explanation. Still a mystery, but I reordered the same AC in black. Would have preferred white, but the Northwest was in the middle of a heat wave, and there were no more available. The identical AC in black works well and cools the house fairly quickly, even with vaulted ceilings.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Life just got better
customer_reviews.text: I have one room that does not get enough AC the master bedroom 15 years I put with it, life just got better it's as cold as I would like it .
customer_reviews.author: Big AL

customer_reviews.title: Great air conditioner
customer_reviews.text: This unit was easy to set up and install. The controls are straight forward. It operates quietly and cools great.
customer_reviews.author: Merry Louise Vanick

customer_reviews.title: WORTHLESS
customer_reviews.text: If I could give it ZERO I would. I have this in a 10 X 16 room. I love in Florida and the room gets a lot of sun, but this AC won't cool it below 90 degrees! Worthless!!!! I researched and thought this would do the trick.. A fan cols the room better. BIG WASTE OF MONEY!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

product_meta.title: Honeywell MN12CESWW Portable Air Conditioner with Dehumidifier & Fan, White Environmental Appliance, Rooms Up To 400-550 Sq. Ft
product_meta.description: The Honeywell MN Series portable air conditioner with protective cover has a sleek, modern design cooling and dehumidifying areas 450-550 square feet. With 3-in-1 technology, this portable air conditioner delivers optimum cooling and dehumidification. It also has a fan-only function. The full-function remote control allows you to operate each feature from across the room. Unlike a fixed AC, this unit requires no permanent installation and four caster wheels provide easy mobility between areas. Plus, the auto-evaporation system allows for hours of continuous operation with no water to drain or no bucket to empty. This MN12CESWW comes with everything needed for setup including a flexible exhaust hose and an easy-to-install window venting kit. When the unit is not in use, the protective cover with pockets will protect your unit plus store the exhaust hose and venting kit.cfm163
feature_bullets: [POWERFUL, SAFE & DEPENDABLE] Cools rooms up to 400-550 sq. ft. Thermal Overload protection for added safety & peace of mind.
[QUICK INSTALLATION] Easy-to-install window venting kit included with adjustable window bracket from 19.9". to 47.25"
[EASY MAINTENANCE] Washable Filter designed to protect from dust & hair to extend product life & performance. Filter cleans easily under a faucet for easy maintenance.
[DESIGNED FOR COMFORT] Enjoy simple digital control with 3 fan speeds, 24 hour energy saving timer & remote control included

[3-IN-1 APPLIANCE] Powerful cooling in the summer, Dehumidifier for humid days (removes up to 66 pints/ 24 hours with continuous drain option for long unattended operation), Fan circulates air for everyday comfort. Exhaust Hose Length: 12" to 47".

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars85 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Warranty Description: Limited 1 year parts and labor for unit and additional 4 years parts for compressor.
specifications.Included Components: Air conditioner, remote control, flexible exhaust hose, window venting kit, manual, warranty
